Text: There doesn't seem to be much seeding going on, not just here but across the "board". We have to change this.

not only does there need to be more seeding, but ive been downloading for days now and ive only gotten access to the highest, 5kb at a time. people need to open up thier bandwidth to uploads while they are downloading... i dont want this to take 90 days to download..

this torrent is updated every month on Demonoid with new books. hence the old one is deleted.

what you have here is just what was posted back in  July.
someone plz seed and no limit their bandwidth

former demonoid member reporting in.
sup fluxxdog?

hey you guy how about whoever lucky enough to have download this collection of pdf maybe we could burn and send them to one another for the resonable price of blank dvds for i had big colection moved out my parent my mother threw it out ....email me at tmk_va@yahoo.com
Well, it's nice to see someone still seeding this after 2 years!  I think it's about time to start up the whole thing again in a couple months >:)

Fluxxdog, thank you for continuing to seed this even more than 2 years later.

Also, thanks to the other seeders.  It's really great to finally find an almost complete DnD 3.5 collection.
big DnD fan, i only play 3.5 so i will probably seed this forever.  someone should let me know if there is a newer/better torrent for 3.5 books.  jackbw at gmail

Someone, for the love of God seed.  I've been seeding for the last 3 days, and I'm still downloading but my down speed has been about 83 KB/s (KB, not MB) from just one dude in Finland.

If you have this, seeding would be appreciated, I will continue to seed.
I should not be uploading faster than my download.  Stop being selfish pricks and seed (I don't care if you're on dial-up if you download; you seed).
Currently DL at an avg. of 600 kb/s. Keep seeding, when I'm done I'll seed for awhile
I love you
